meanings.definition: A person who takes part in a game or sport.
meanings.sent1: The soccer player scored a goal.
meanings.sent2: The basketball player dribbled down the court.
meanings.sent3: The young player giggled as he kicked the ball into his own goal.
meanings.sent4: She was a chess player, always thinking two steps ahead.
meanings.sent5: The baseball player swung the bat with all his might.

meanings.definition: A person who performs on a musical instrument.
meanings.sent1: The piano player played a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent2: The guitar player strummed the chords with skill.
meanings.sent3: The young player hit the wrong note and caused a giggle in the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the piano keys like a skilled player.
meanings.sent5: The violin player's music filled the room with emotion.

meanings.definition: A person who participates in a romantic or sexual relationship without commitment.
meanings.sent1: The casual player enjoyed dating without any serious commitments.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a player, never settling down with one person.
meanings.sent3: The player flirted with everyone at the party, causing some raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: His smooth words made him a player in the dating scene.
meanings.sent5: She was a player, hopping from one relationship to the next.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled at manipulating or exploiting others for personal gain.
meanings.sent1: The cunning player always knew how to get what he wanted.
meanings.sent2: She was a master player in the art of deception.
meanings.sent3: The player tricked his friends into doing his homework for him.
meanings.sent4: Her charm made her a player in the world of business.
meanings.sent5: He was a player, manipulating situations to his advantage.
